org.mini2Dx.core.graphics.pipeline

Class RenderPipeline

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mini2Dx.core.graphics.pipeline.RenderPipeline

  • public class RenderPipeline
extends java.lang.Object
    Stores a sequences of RenderOperations to be applied and (optionally) unapplied. By default this will go from 0 - length and apply the operations, then unapply the operations in reverse order. If you do not require the operations to be unapplied, setOneWay(boolean) to true.
